Elite Date - web design

In Elite Date client decided for new look of the webpage. We wanted to create light and more elegant feeling for our website. Firstly, graphic designer designed landing page for homosexuals, and I coded it. Then he started to work on Homepage, but he only sketched hero section and few other sections. I finished and edited the design according to clientsâ€™ needs and then I coded the homepage as well. Then I designed other pages as blog and few other landing pages, but these are not yet deployed, so sadly I cannot show them.

I also designed and coded few small changes which needed to be added to the website. I also designed sale banners for push notifications a facebook adds.

Down below you can see the new homepage which of approx. 80% I designed.
